text:
If you need #vaccine #storage for the #covid19 #vaccination, @pklgroup are ready to help at a moment’s notice thanks to their extensive #fleet of #cold #rooms, #fridges & #freezers which are suitable for all the #covid #vaccines currently used in the #UK
